description: A classic piece for travel or the daily grind. Twill fabric is water resistant, so it holds up to the occassional bout of rain or coffee disaster.Twill polyester fabric features a water resistant PU coating and DWR finish.Aluminum RFID shield layer prevents information theft from chipped cards.2 external slots for cards and a sleeve for airline tickets.Central sleeve is large enough to hold 10-year Canadian passports.
name: MEC Timezone Passport Sleeve
